title: Typee by Herman Melville [republicV]
description: Typee is Herman MelvilleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s first book, recounting his experiences after having jumped ship in the Marquesas Islands in 1842, and becoming a captive of a cannibal island tribe. It was an immediate success in America and England, and was MelvilleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most popular work during his lifetime.
